meta.title: About Us | ThinkForward Immigration
meta.description: Learn about ThinkForward, our mission to simplify the immigration process, and the team behind our innovative AI-powered solutions.

hero.title: Simplifying Immigration with AI
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to make immigration more accessible, efficient, and stress-free through innovative technology.

mission_vision.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission_vision.subtitle: What drives us and where we're headed

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to immigration services by leveraging AI technology, making the process more accessible, efficient, and transparent for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where geographic borders don't limit human potential, and where technological innovation empowers individuals to navigate immigration systems with confidence.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

trust.title: Trust & Integrity
trust.description: We build trust through transparency, honesty, and by prioritizing our users' best interests in every decision we make.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We're committed to pushing boundaries and developing cutting-edge solutions that transform the immigration experience.

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: We believe in the power of community and strive to create products that unite and empower immigrant communities worldwide.

quality.title: Excellence & Quality
quality.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards, ensuring our technology and advice is accurate, reliable, and user-friendly.

member1.name: Yansi He
member1.bio: A gold medal immigration consultant from UBC and former chief immigration advisor at a law firm, Yansi founded ThinkForward with a vision to make immigration simpler for everyone. She combines her legal expertise with a passion for technology to help people navigate their immigration journey with confidence.

member2.name: Ben Zhou
member2.bio: A leading expert in AI and machine learning, Ben drives the technological innovations that power our platform, ensuring intelligent and reliable solutions.

member3.name: Danniel Zheng
member3.bio: With a user-centric approach, Danniel oversees product development, ensuring our tools are intuitive, effective, and aligned with client needs.

member4.name: Dongmei Ma
member4.bio: Dongmei brings extensive expertise in immigration law, ensuring our AI solutions provide accurate guidance while navigating complex legal frameworks.

milestones.title: Our Journey
milestones.subtitle: Key milestones in our mission to transform immigration

founding.title: Founded in Vancouver
founding.description: ThinkForward was founded with a vision to leverage AI to simplify immigration processes for everyone.

launch.title: First AI Immigration Assistant
launch.description: Launched our first AI-powered immigration assistant, helping users navigate basic immigration questions.

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded our services to support multiple countries and immigration pathways, with support for 7 languages.

ai.title: Advanced AI Platform
ai.description: Introduced our comprehensive AI platform for immigration consultants, revolutionizing how professionals serve clients.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.
